scripts.build-win-binaries: npm run cmake-configure && npm run cmake-build && npm run copy-exe && npm run windeploy && npm run prep-package && npm run package-app
scripts.build-win-binaries-target-x86: npm run cmake-configure-target-x86 && npm run cmake-build && npm run copy-exe && npm run windeploy && npm run prep-package && npm run package-app-target-x86
scripts.copy-exe: if not exist final mkdir final && copy .\build\Release\video-simili-duplicate-cleaner.exe final\"Video simili duplicate cleaner.exe"
scripts.windeploy: echo Skipping windeployqt - using static build
scripts.prep-package: copy logo150x150.png final\logo150x150.png && copy logo44x44.png final\logo44x44.png && copy Icon1024.png final\Icon1024.png && copy appxmanifest.xml final\appxmanifest.xml
scripts.package-app: MakeAppX pack /d final /p "Video simili duplicate cleaner.arm64.msix"
scripts.package-app-target-x86: MakeAppX pack /d final /p "Video simili duplicate cleaner.x86.msix"
scripts.clean: npm run cmake-clean && (npm run clean-leftovers || exit 0)
scripts.clean-leftovers: (rmdir /q /s build || exit 0) && (rmdir /q /s final || exit 0) && (del /f "Video simili duplicate cleaner.arm64.msix" || exit 0) && (del /f "Video simili duplicate cleaner.x86.msix" || exit 0)
